net.consensys.cava.concurrent

Interface AsyncCompletion

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CompletableAsyncCompletion

    public interface AsyncCompletion
    A completion that will be complete at a future time.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static AsyncCompletion COMPLETED 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AsyncCompletion accept(java.util.function.Consumer<? super java.lang.Throwable> consumer)
      Returns a new completion that completes successfully, after executing the given function with this completion's exception (if any).
      static AsyncCompletion allOf(AsyncCompletion... cs)
      Returns an AsyncCompletion that completes when all of the given completions complete.
      static AsyncCompletion allOf(java.util.Collection<AsyncCompletion> cs)
      Returns an AsyncCompletion that completes when all of the given completions complete.
      static AsyncCompletion allOf(java.util.stream.Stream<AsyncCompletion> cs)
      Returns an AsyncCompletion that completes when all of the given completions complete.
      boolean cancel()
      Attempt to cancel execution of this task.
      static AsyncCompletion completed()
      Return an already completed completion.
      static AsyncCompletion exceptional(java.lang.Throwable ex)
      Return an already failed completion, caused by the given exception.
      AsyncCompletion exceptionally(java.util.function.Consumer<? super java.lang.Throwable> consumer)
      Returns a new completion that, when this result completes exceptionally, completes after executing the supplied function.
      static AsyncCompletion executeBlocking(java.util.concurrent.Executor executor, java.lang.Runnable action)
      Returns a completion that completes after the given blocking action executes asynchronously on an Executor.
      static AsyncCompletion executeBlocking(java.lang.Runnable action)
      Returns a completion that completes after the given blocking action executes asynchronously on ForkJoinPool.commonPool().
      static AsyncCompletion executeBlocking(io.vertx.core.Vertx vertx, java.lang.Runnable action)
      Returns a completion that completes after the given blocking action executes asynchronously on a vertx context.
      static AsyncCompletion executeBlocking(io.vertx.core.WorkerExecutor executor, java.lang.Runnable action)
      Returns a completion that completes after the given blocking action executes asynchronously on a vertx executor.
      <U> AsyncResult<U> handle(java.util.function.Function<? super java.lang.Throwable,? extends U> fn)
      Returns a new result that, when this result completes either normally or exceptionally, completes with the value obtained from executing the supplied function with this result's exception (if any) as an argument.
      static CompletableAsyncCompletion incomplete()
      Return an incomplete completion, that can be later completed or failed.
      boolean isCancelled()
      Returns true if this task was cancelled before it completed normally.
      boolean isCompletedExceptionally()
      Returns true if completed exceptionally or cancelled.
      boolean isDone()
      Returns true if completed normally, completed exceptionally or cancelled.
      void join()
      Waits if necessary for the computation to complete.
      void join(long timeout, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
      Waits if necessary for at most the given time for the computation to complete.
      static AsyncCompletion runOnContext(io.vertx.core.Vertx vertx, java.lang.Runnable action)
      Returns a completion that completes after the given action executes on a vertx context.
      static AsyncCompletion runOnContext(io.vertx.core.Vertx vertx, java.util.function.Supplier<? extends AsyncCompletion> fn)
      Returns a completion that, after the given function executes on a vertx context and returns a completion, completes when the completion from the function does.
      <U> AsyncResult<U> then(java.util.function.Supplier<? extends AsyncResult<U>> fn)
      Returns a new completion that, when this completion completes normally, completes with the same value or exception as the result returned after executing the given function.
      <U,V> AsyncResult<V> thenApply(AsyncResult<? extends U> other, java.util.function.Function<? super U,? extends V> fn)
      Returns a result that, when this completion and the other result both complete normally, completes with the value obtained from executing the supplied function with the value from the other result as an argument.
      AsyncCompletion thenCombine(AsyncCompletion other)
      Returns a completion that completes when both this completion and the other complete normally.
      AsyncCompletion thenCompose(java.util.function.Supplier<? extends AsyncCompletion> fn)
      When this result completes normally, invokes the given function with the resulting value and obtain a new AsyncCompletion.
      <U> AsyncCompletion thenConsume(AsyncResult<? extends U> other, java.util.function.Consumer<? super U> consumer)
      Returns a completion that, when this completion and the supplied result both complete normally, completes after executing the supplied function with the value from the supplied result as an argument.
      AsyncCompletion thenRun(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
      Returns a new completion that, when this completion completes normally, completes after given action is executed.
      <U> AsyncResult<U> thenSchedule(io.vertx.core.Vertx vertx, java.util.function.Supplier<? extends AsyncResult<U>> fn)
      Returns a new result that, when this completion completes normally, completes with the same value or exception as the completion returned after executing the given function on the vertx context.
      AsyncCompletion thenScheduleBlockingRun(io.vertx.core.Vertx vertx, java.lang.Runnable runnable)
      Returns a new completion that, when this completion completes normally, completes after the given blocking action is executed on the vertx context.
      AsyncCompletion thenScheduleBlockingRun(io.vertx.core.WorkerExecutor executor, java.lang.Runnable runnable)
      Returns a new completion that, when this completion completes normally, completes after the given blocking action is executed on the vertx executor.
      AsyncCompletion thenScheduleRun(io.vertx.core.Vertx vertx, java.lang.Runnable runnable)
      Returns a new completion that, when this completion completes normally, completes after the given action is executed on the vertx context.
      <U> AsyncResult<U> thenSupply(java.util.function.Supplier<? extends U> supplier)
      Returns a completion that, when this result completes normally, completes with the value obtained after executing the supplied function.
      <U> AsyncResult<U> thenSupply(io.vertx.core.Vertx vertx, java.util.function.Supplier<? extends U> supplier)
      Returns a completion that, when this result completes normally, completes with the value obtained after executing the supplied function on the vertx context.
      AsyncCompletion whenComplete(java.util.function.Consumer<? super java.lang.Throwable> consumer)
      Returns a new completion that completes in the same manner as this completion, after executing the given function with this completion's exception (if any).

      • exceptional

        static AsyncCompletion exceptional(java.lang.Throwable ex)
        Return an already failed completion, caused by the given exception.
        Parameters:
        ex - The exception.
        Returns:
        A failed result.

      • incomplete

        static CompletableAsyncCompletion incomplete()
        Return an incomplete completion, that can be later completed or failed.
        Returns:
        An incomplete completion.

      • allOf

        static AsyncCompletion allOf(AsyncCompletion... cs)
        Returns an AsyncCompletion that completes when all of the given completions complete. If any completions complete exceptionally, then the resulting completion also completes exceptionally.
        Parameters:
        cs - The completions to combine.
        Returns:
        A completion.

      • allOf

        static AsyncCompletion allOf(java.util.Collection<AsyncCompletion> cs)
        Returns an AsyncCompletion that completes when all of the given completions complete. If any completions complete exceptionally, then the resulting completion also completes exceptionally.
        Parameters:
        cs - The completions to combine.
        Returns:
        A completion.

      • allOf

        static AsyncCompletion allOf(java.util.stream.Stream<AsyncCompletion> cs)
        Returns an AsyncCompletion that completes when all of the given completions complete. If any completions complete exceptionally, then the resulting completion also completes exceptionally.
        Parameters:
        cs - The completions to combine.
        Returns:
        A completion.

      • runOnContext

        static AsyncCompletion runOnContext(io.vertx.core.Vertx vertx,
                                    java.util.function.Supplier<? extends AsyncCompletion> fn)
        Returns a completion that, after the given function executes on a vertx context and returns a completion, completes when the completion from the function does.
        Parameters:
        vertx - The vertx context.
        fn - The function returning a completion.
        Returns:
        A completion.

      • runOnContext

        static AsyncCompletion runOnContext(io.vertx.core.Vertx vertx,
                                    java.lang.Runnable action)
        Returns a completion that completes after the given action executes on a vertx context.

        Note that the given function is run directly on the context and should not block.

        Parameters:
        vertx - The vertx context.
        action - The action to execute.
        Returns:
        A completion.

        Returns a completion that completes after the given blocking action executes asynchronously on ForkJoinPool.commonPool().
        Parameters:
        action - The blocking action to execute.
        Returns:
        A completion.

                                       java.lang.Runnable action)

        Parameters:
        executor - A vertx executor.
        action - The blocking action to execute.
        Returns:

      • isDone

        boolean isDone()
        Returns true if completed normally, completed exceptionally or cancelled.
        Returns:
        true if completed.

      • isCompletedExceptionally

        boolean isCompletedExceptionally()
        Returns true if completed exceptionally or cancelled.
        Returns:
        true if completed exceptionally or cancelled.

      • cancel

        boolean cancel()
        Attempt to cancel execution of this task.

        This attempt will fail if the task has already completed, has already been cancelled, or could not be cancelled for some other reason. If successful, and this task has not started when cancel is called, this task should never run.

        After this method returns, subsequent calls to isDone() will always return true. Subsequent calls to isCancelled() will always return true if this method returned true.

        Returns:
        true if this completion transitioned to a cancelled state.

      • isCancelled

        boolean isCancelled()
        Returns true if this task was cancelled before it completed normally.
        Returns:
        true if completed.

      • join

        void join()
   throws java.util.concurrent.CompletionException,
          java.lang.InterruptedException
        Waits if necessary for the computation to complete.
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.CompletionException - If the computation threw an exception.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the current thread was interrupted while waiting.

      • join

        void join(long timeout,
          java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
   throws java.util.concurrent.CompletionException,
          java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException,
          java.lang.InterruptedException
        Waits if necessary for at most the given time for the computation to complete.
        Parameters:
        timeout - The maximum time to wait.
        unit - The time unit of the timeout argument.
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.CompletionException - If the computation threw an exception.
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - If the wait timed out.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the current thread was interrupted while waiting.

      • then

        <U> AsyncResult<U> then(java.util.function.Supplier<? extends AsyncResult<U>> fn)
        Returns a new completion that, when this completion completes normally, completes with the same value or exception as the result returned after executing the given function.
        Type Parameters:
        U - The type of the returned result's value.
        Parameters:
        fn - The function returning a new result.
        Returns:
        A new result.

                                java.util.function.Supplier<? extends AsyncResult<U>> fn)

        Type Parameters:
        U - The type of the returned result's value.
        Parameters:
        vertx - The vertx context.
        fn - The function returning a new result.
        Returns:
        A new result.

      • thenRun

        AsyncCompletion thenRun(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Returns a new completion that, when this completion completes normally, completes after given action is executed.
        Parameters:
        runnable - Te action to perform before completing the returned AsyncCompletion.
        Returns:
        A completion.

      • thenScheduleRun

        AsyncCompletion thenScheduleRun(io.vertx.core.Vertx vertx,
                                java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Returns a new completion that, when this completion completes normally, completes after the given action is executed on the vertx context.
        Parameters:
        vertx - The vertx context.
        runnable - The action to execute on the vertx context before completing the returned completion.
        Returns:
        A completion.

                                        java.lang.Runnable runnable)

        Parameters:
        vertx - The vertx context.
        runnable - The action to execute on the vertx context before completing the returned completion.
        Returns:
        A completion.

        Parameters:
        fn - The function returning a new completion.
        Returns:
        A completion.

      • thenSupply

        <U> AsyncResult<U> thenSupply(java.util.function.Supplier<? extends U> supplier)
        Returns a completion that, when this result completes normally, completes with the value obtained after executing the supplied function.
        Type Parameters:
        U - The function's return type.
        Parameters:
        supplier - The function to use to compute the value of the returned result.
        Returns:
        A new result.

      • thenConsume

        <U> AsyncCompletion thenConsume(AsyncResult<? extends U> other,
                                java.util.function.Consumer<? super U> consumer)
        Returns a completion that, when this completion and the supplied result both complete normally, completes after executing the supplied function with the value from the supplied result as an argument.
        Type Parameters:
        U - The type of the other's value.
        Parameters:
        other - The other result.
        consumer - The function to execute.
        Returns:
        A new result.

      • thenApply

        <U,V> AsyncResult<V> thenApply(AsyncResult<? extends U> other,
                               java.util.function.Function<? super U,? extends V> fn)
        Returns a result that, when this completion and the other result both complete normally, completes with the value obtained from executing the supplied function with the value from the other result as an argument.
        Type Parameters:
        U - The type of the other's value.
        V - The type of the value returned by the function.
        Parameters:
        other - The other result.
        fn - The function to execute.
        Returns:
        A new result.

      • thenCombine

        AsyncCompletion thenCombine(AsyncCompletion other)
        Returns a completion that completes when both this completion and the other complete normally.
        Parameters:
        other - The other completion.
        Returns:
        A completion.

      • exceptionally

        AsyncCompletion exceptionally(java.util.function.Consumer<? super java.lang.Throwable> consumer)
        Returns a new completion that, when this result completes exceptionally, completes after executing the supplied function. Otherwise, if this result completes normally, then the returned result also completes normally with the same value.
        Parameters:
        consumer - The function to execute.
        Returns:
        A new result.

      • whenComplete

        AsyncCompletion whenComplete(java.util.function.Consumer<? super java.lang.Throwable> consumer)
        Returns a new completion that completes in the same manner as this completion, after executing the given function with this completion's exception (if any).

        The exception supplied to the function will be null if this completion completes successfully.

        Parameters:
        consumer - The action to execute.
        Returns:
        A new result.

      • handle

        <U> AsyncResult<U> handle(java.util.function.Function<? super java.lang.Throwable,? extends U> fn)
        Returns a new result that, when this result completes either normally or exceptionally, completes with the value obtained from executing the supplied function with this result's exception (if any) as an argument.

        The exception supplied to the function will be null if this completion completes successfully.

        Type Parameters:
        U - The type of the value returned from the function.
        Parameters:
        fn - The function to execute.
        Returns:
        A new result.

      • accept

        AsyncCompletion accept(java.util.function.Consumer<? super java.lang.Throwable> consumer)
        Returns a new completion that completes successfully, after executing the given function with this completion's exception (if any).

        The exception supplied to the function will be null if this completion completes successfully.

        Parameters:
        consumer - The action to execute.
        Returns:
        A new result.
